title: IP Boost!
body:
Hi.
I just bought some IP boost for 14 days and 50 matches, I wonder where I can check my IP Boost which a new client. I look around but can't find my where I can look at my IP boost. Sorry for my bad Grammar.

replies.body: It should be located under your **Profile **panel on the client.  Just under your summoner name, you'll see a few icons for things like honor points as well as boosts.  Let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=21iHcOHW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-26T22:52:13.414+0000)
>
> It should be located under your **Profile **panel on the client.  Just under your summoner name, you'll see a few icons for things like honor points as well as boosts.  Let me know if that helps.

update new IP first win pls 150 so low.champion 1350 3150 4800 6300 buy IP so high.play vs bot win all game ramdon IP so low.i not time play game
